Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and the Unpaid Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows King Guz's staged 'drowning' and Alley Oop's subsequent confrontation regarding an old debt, highlighting Alley's opportunistic nature.

sub_scenes.title: Staged Drowning and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz pretends to drown and is 'rescued' by Alley Oop in a seemingly heroic act.

sub_scenes.title: Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately after the 'rescue', Alley Oop reveals his ulterior motive by demanding repayment of a debt from King Guz.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto Soreness's Clumsy Journey
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Alley Oop's journey with Bronto Soreness, marked by the dinosaur's repeated collisions and the diagnosis of its old age.

sub_scenes.title: Pleasant Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and Bronto Soreness begin their journey in good weather.

sub_scenes.title: Tree Collision Incident
sub_scenes.description: Bronto Soreness unexpectedly bumps into a tree, causing a minor incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Diagnosis of Dinosaur's Age
sub_scenes.description: The reason for Bronto Soreness's clumsiness is revealed to be its old age, diagnosed by another character.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-In at Honest Zog's
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the consideration and execution of trading in Bronto Soreness for a newer dinosaur at Honest Zog's dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a Trade-In
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is convinced to consider trading in his old dinosaur for a newer model.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and another character arrive at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership to look at new dinosaurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive Offer
sub_scenes.description: Honest Zog offers Alley Oop a test drive for a smaller dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Deal Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: A deal is discussed at the dealership, possibly finalizing Dinny's trade-in.

sub_scenes.title: Exciting and Perilous Test Drive
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop takes the dinosaur for a test drive, which starts excitingly but turns dangerous when the dinosaur bites at him.

sub_scenes.title: Deal Conclusion and Old Dinosaur's Sadness
sub_scenes.description: Despite the biting incident, Alley Oop buys the dinosaur, while the old dinosaur expresses sadness at being replaced.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and New Dinosaur Instructions
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and others say goodbye to the old dinosaur and receive instructions for operating the new one.

sub_scenes.title: Regret and Old Dinosaur's Fate
sub_scenes.description: Dinny reflects on the trade-in with regret, while the old dinosaur is marked down for sale at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Scolding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley Oop's initial experiences with the new dinosaur, including a mishap and subsequent scolding from Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Interactions
sub_scenes.description: Scenes at the dinosaur dealership showing different customer experiences.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: First Ride and Palm Tree Bump
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur ends with a minor collision.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Scolding After Fall
sub_scenes.description: Dinny scolds Alley Oop for falling off the new dinosaur after the tree bump.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Impending Charge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays Dinny's anger and protective nature towards his dinosaur, culminating in an aggressive charge towards cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Outburst and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny expresses anger and defends his dinosaur from perceived mistreatment.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Charge
sub_scenes.description: Dinny charges towards cave children playing with bones, possibly misdirecting his anger.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley Oop and Ooola's Breakup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating conflict between Alley Oop and Ooola leading to a breakup and a violent act.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Ooola fishing, but she declines, initiating their argument.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: The rejection escalates into accusations and Ooola declares their relationship is over.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: Ooola physically attacks Alley Oop with a large rock after their breakup.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes misogynistic views through a fishing trip conversation, highlighting negative stereotypes about women.

sub_scenes.title: General Misogynistic Musings
sub_scenes.description: A man expresses his frustration and negative views about women's unpredictable nature.

sub_scenes.title: Noisy Fishing and Complaint
sub_scenes.description: Another man's noisy baiting and talking while fishing draws complaints from others.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Retort and Apology
sub_scenes.description: A fishing dispute escalates with a misogynistic insult, followed by a quiet apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Competition and Misunderstanding over Oola
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic rivalry and misunderstandings surrounding Oola's affections, leading to jealousy and physical conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Talk of Female Attention and Competition
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss competition for female attention, specifically mentioning Oola.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention

sub_scenes.title: Argument over Oola's Interest
sub_scenes.description: An argument erupts over whether Oola would be interested in a particular caveman.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Successful Flirtation and Jealousy
sub_scenes.description: A caveman successfully flirts with Oola, provoking jealous reactions from others.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to a physical confrontation and violence.

Major_Arcs.title: Romance Lessons and Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of romance through humorous dialogue and misunderstanding between cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Threat and Romantic Retort
sub_scenes.description: A threat of violence is met with a clever retort about needing romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Tree Climbing Vulgarity
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts romantic rivalry through gift-giving and introduces a humorous scene of 'vulgar' tree climbing.

sub_scenes.title: Flower Offering and Competitive Reaction
sub_scenes.description: A romantic flower offering sparks jealousy and a vow to outdo the gesture.

sub_scenes.title: Branch Gift and Crocodile Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Another romantic gesture involving a leafy branch leads to a confrontation with a crocodile.

sub_scenes.title: Vulgar Tree Climbing
sub_scenes.description: A humorous scene of tree climbing deemed 'vulgar' by an observer.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Jealousy and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of jealousy, possessiveness, and misunderstandings in romantic relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback Anger and Possessiveness
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals anger over stolen affection, while Koko expresses possessiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Cowardice and Cannibalism
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of accusation, cowardice, and a dramatic accusation of cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstood Kiss Clarification
sub_scenes.description: A jealous accusation about 'eating fingers' is humorously clarified as a kiss on a 'baboon's hand'.

Major_Arcs.title: Infidelity, Forgiveness, and New Romantic Leaf
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with themes of infidelity, forgiveness, and attempts at romantic change.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Clubbing for Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: A caveman is violently punished for infidelity.

sub_scenes.title: Guilt, Forgiveness, and Derogatory Comment
sub_scenes.description: Guilt and plea for forgiveness are juxtaposed with a seemingly unrelated derogatory comment.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic New Leaf Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A caveman vows to become more romantic.

sub_scenes.title: Frustration with Women (Recurring Theme)
sub_scenes.description: A return to comedic frustration with understanding women.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and Its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous and dangerous fad of 'the twitch' dance, from injuries to social pressure to learn it.

sub_scenes.title: The Twist's Toll and Injuries
sub_scenes.description: Injuries resulting from 'the twist' dance are observed and discussed.

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Learn the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: Social pressure to learn 'the twitch' dance is highlighted.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson Mishaps and Instructor's Name Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A humorous dance lesson ensues, filled with mishaps and a comedic name reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Nightly Debrief, Prank, and Hospital Ward
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the lesson leads to humiliation and a surprising revelation about the dangers of even watching 'the twitch'.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Interruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc blends historical research with time travel, leading to a romantic encounter and its abrupt interruption.

sub_scenes.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Idea
sub_scenes.description: Researchers seek firsthand historical information and consider time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel to Romantic Prehistoric Scene
sub_scenes.description: Time travel leads to a romantic encounter in prehistoric times.

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Interruption and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Time travelers arrive in the 20th century, are given an assignment, and promptly sent back.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Serenade Racket and Bullfight Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a disruptive serenade leading to a bullfight incident and a 'novelty' bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ancient Spain and Serenade Racket
sub_scenes.description: Time travelers return to ancient Spain, where a loud serenade is causing a disturbance.

narrative_arcs.title: Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment
The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Incident and Novelty Act
sub_scenes.description: The serenade incident escalates, leading to a bullfight being disrupted and a 'novelty' act taking its place.

narrative_arcs.title: The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Waiting, Flirtation, and Romantic Accusations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc combines themes of waiting for information, flirtation, and romantic jealousy and accusations.

sub_scenes.title: Impatient Wait for Oop's Return
sub_scenes.description: A woman impatiently waits for 'oop' to return with needed information.

sub_scenes.title: Flirtatious Reward
sub_scenes.description: A flirtatious exchange involves promises of kisses as a reward for bravery.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Delayed Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A rescue scene leads to a reunion and anticipation of a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Unrequited Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Romantic accusations and a continued longing for a kiss are intertwined.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day - Satire on Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes the concept of kingship through the humorous events of a 'King for a Day' scenario.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced with its ironic labor.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Burden of Kingship
sub_scenes.description: The 'king' faces shadowy figures and discusses the perceived ease of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: Temporary Replacement King and Crowd Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A temporary king is appointed but faces immediate rejection and humiliation from the crowd.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification

sub_scenes.title: New King's Isolation and Former King's Satisfaction
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king is isolated, while the previous king enjoys the manipulated chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and Queen - Domestic Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts domestic disputes between Guz and the Queen, centered around bon-bons (ulcer pills) and dirty feet.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Indulgence and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Guz enjoys 'bon-bons' which are revealed to be ulcer pills by the Queen.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust

sub_scenes.title: Dirty Feet Punishment and Sarcastic Compliance
sub_scenes.description: The Queen punishes Guz for dirty feet, leading to sarcastic compliance.

narrative_arcs.title: True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

Major_Arcs.title: Rum-Pus Cheating and Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously resolves a dispute over clams and cheating at a game using a 'wise' but unconventional method.

sub_scenes.title: Cheating Accusation and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of cheating at rum-pus lead to a fight over money.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The fight is revealed to be over found clams, and a Wise Man is summoned to resolve it.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

sub_scenes.title: Wise Man's Clam Confiscation Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The Wise Man resolves the dispute by confiscating the clams, leaving both men with nothing to fight over.

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Troubles and Dinner Interruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays various royal troubles, from recurring fights to financial accusations, culminating in a dinner scene interrupted by violence.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fight and Money Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Recurring fights and accusations of financial dishonesty plague the royal setting.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: Dinner is announced, but health concerns interrupt the crowned man's enjoyment.

sub_scenes.title: Prank and Sudden Violent Attack
sub_scenes.description: A playful prank abruptly turns violent, interrupting the meal.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, New Roles, and Strange Ducks
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features various unrelated scenes involving apologies, role changes, and bizarre occurrences.

sub_scenes.title: Oompa and Pal's Apologies
sub_scenes.description: Separate scenes of apology and remorse between different characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Citizen Status and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: A character rejoices in returning to ordinary life, followed by a ruler proposition.

sub_scenes.title: Board Measurement and Strange Duck
sub_scenes.description: An odd scene involving measurements, strange reactions, and a 'strange duck' comment.

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and Forced Shaving 'Barberous' Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc combines fortune telling with a surprising and 'barberous' act of forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling Setup
sub_scenes.description: Fortune telling sets up expectation of meeting a bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving 'Barberous' Act Unveiled
sub_scenes.description: What seems like a romantic setup is revealed to be a forced shaving scenario.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a scientist's time machine experiment leading to the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Intention
sub_scenes.description: A scientist prepares his time machine to bring someone from the past.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Roman Soldier Materialization
sub_scenes.description: The time machine experiment results in the surprising appearance of a Roman soldier.
